attributes.background: Home owners of Lawley and Lightmore in telford have to pay an annual fee to Bournville Trust to maintain their area on top of their council tax. Many areas have not been handed over to Bournville trust from the developers so in many cases home owners are paying them to do nothing.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors  

You may also find some useful information about making a complaint here:

https://england.shelter.org.uk/housing_advice/council_housing_association/complaints_about_housing_associations"
